introduction: Hyun Soo, a woman in mid 20s, lives with a younger sister in a small leaky semi-basement flat. She tries to find a new job after an unfair dismissal. But it's not easy. And she can't get in touch with her boy friend. Sang Jin, a young man living on a rooftop of the flat has an unexpected visit from his father who is a vagabond painter. He sees Hyun Soo by chance and paints her and leaves to somewhere without saying goodbye. Thanks to the painting, Hyun Soo and Sang Jin meets.
